Kirill Novik: Web Developer

Kirill Novik is a MEAN Stack Web Developer. He has worked in the past for Medtronic/Covidien and several startups. He earned his bachelors in Computer Science and Molecular, Celular and Developmental Biology on December 2015.It is studying biology, he realized that writing computer software is similar to studying complex biological systems. Both of these occupations deal with complexity and the logic underlying figuring out the root of a complex problem. Over the years he grew passionate about the web technologies as the feedback loops of writing web appliactions is short (time it takes to see the effect of work put into the project) and the potential of creating apps with modern APIs is almost unlimited.

Today he is proficient creating both ends of appliactions and is capable of providing services compliant with the modern standards of the industry. His skills include, but are not limited to, Node.js, MongoDB, jQuery, JavaScript, .NET, C#> and PHP, as well as various build frameworks and continuous integration platforms.
